title: FS/FT: T206 Frank Smith (Chi. & Bos.) Cycle 460 PSA 5!
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS/FT: T206 Frank Smith (Chi. & Bos.) Cycle 460 PSA 5!
posts.post_content: Two PSA 2 commons just sold for $700 on Sterling Auctions(3/8).  This is Frank Smith(rare version) in a PSA 5! According to PSA Pop. report, this is the highest graded, with a total of only 3 ever graded. Another rare thing about this card is that there are none higher than a psa 7 counting all backs!! Current SMR price for a common back in PSA 5 is $650! Fellow member Scot Reader has this back at a 13x premium for commons based on the current market from all of his research. Scans below, thanks........ Offered at $2750, this is a tremendous investment card....
still available....open to cash or T206 trade offers....thanks

Just to be clear, my article developed market multipliers for T206 backs based on sales of common subjects (which is mentioned in the article).  I did not study market multipliers for premium subjects.

[quote name="sreader3" post=1060015]Just to be clear, my article developed market multipliers for T206 backs based on sales of common subjects (which is mentioned in the article).  I did not study market multipliers for premium subjects.[/QUOTE]

listing edited....thanks
A recent PSA 5 with a Pied 42 back sold for $2100...
Thanks for the inquiries. Yes, I would entertain trades.....thanks
